text: Theodor "Turl" Wagner (6 August 1927 – 21 January 2020) was an Austrian footballer who played as a striker. ==International career== He made his debut for Austria in a November 1946 friendly match against Switzerland and was a participant at the 1954 FIFA World Cup,Record at FIFA Tournaments - FIFA where he scored a hat-trick in the 7–5 quarterfinal win over Switzerland. He earned 46 caps, scoring 22 goals.Appearances for Austrian National Team - RSSSF His last international was a March 1957 friendly match against West Germany. ==Death== Wagner died on 21 January 2020 in Vienna, at the age of 92. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Austrian footballers Category:Austria international footballers Category:Olympic footballers of Austria Category:Footballers at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:1954 FIFA World Cup players Category:FC Wacker Innsbruck players Category:Austrian football managers Category:FC Wacker Innsbruck managers Category:Association football forwards
title: Theodor Wagner
